proofassistant

Class ProofStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • proofassistant.ProofStage

  • public class ProofStage
extends java.lang.Object
    The ProofStage class holds an array of NDLines, and contains various mutator methods for this array. This class supersedes aspects of the earlier ProofMethods classes (now called ProofObject).
    Since:
    Proof Assistant 2.0

    • Constructor Summary

      ProofStage(NDLine[] newArray)
      Class constructor

      Returns a string containing the TeX code for displaying the current proofArray.

      Parses and prints the proofArray
      void printProofArrayLines()
      Prints the lines of the proofArray in TeX format
